article_node.title: WayKen Expands CNC Machining Capabilities to Meet Growing Drone Parts Manufacturing Demand
article_node.summary: WayKen Rapid Manufacturing has upgraded its CNC titanium machining capabilities to meet rising demand for drone components, focusing on high‑mix, low‑volume production of complex structural parts. The new setup features advanced five‑axis machines, precision tooling, and real‑time tool wear monitoring, enabling tolerances as tight as 0.005 mm and surface finishes up to Ra 0.2 µm. This expansion supports drone manufacturers across agriculture, construction, surveying, and logistics, enhancing speed, accuracy, and flexibility in producing lightweight, high‑strength parts.
